oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: V. E. King Job No. 36550
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Husky, Ferlin; Price, Ray, 1926-2013;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 1112) for an order placed by V. E. King for 400 two color jumbos for a performance by Ferlin Husky, Simon Crum, and Ray Price at the Macon Auditorium in Macon, Georgia on April 17. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
